subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
Cheating
lead_paragraph: Fans in the Boston area were indignant over the penalties issued to Tom Brady and the Patriots. Fans elsewhere were applauding the N.F.L. and Commissioner Roger Goodell.
snippet: Fans in the Boston area were indignant over the penalties issued to Tom Brady and the Patriots. Fans elsewhere were applauding the N.F.L. and Commissioner Roger Goodell.
